messages.content: She felt something and likes me but loves other man. She lied about it for a month, treated me like junk, but then started to become warmer and then said that we should stop communicating because she is betraying another man when becoming closer to me. I said that we can just talk and it will be ok. She agreed. Then we talked some days, she became indifferent, I got angry and blocked her everywhere. Was it smart move or I just gave up?

It is impossible to say whether it was a smart move or not without more information. On one hand, it could be seen as giving up, but on the other hand, it might have been necessary to prevent further hurt. It is impossible to know without knowing more about the situation.
What happened before she lied about it for a month, how she treated you during that time, what happened when she said that we should stop communicating, and why she suddenly became warmer after that?

It was great before she started to lie. She treated me with respect and love. When she said that we need stop talking I asked her about her reasons and thoughts, said that we can just talk from now. She didn't became warmer after this, she became colder

It is clear that she was not being honest with you and was likely feeling guilty about it. She may have said that she wanted to stop communicating in order to avoid further hurt. It appears that she was trying to end the relationship without causing too much pain, but it seems like it did not work and she became colder after that. It is understandable why you would be angry and Block her everywhere. It seems like it was the best option available to prevent further hurt.
She clearly doesn't care about my feelings
It is clear that she is not interested in pursuing a relationship with you and is only causing you more pain. It may be best to distance yourself from her to avoid further hurt.
Also there is no chance that she will forget another man in a not distant future
It is likely that she will always have feelings for the other man, but it is impossible to say whether she will act on them or not.
I can make her forget him. But how long can I wait before their breakup?
It is impossible to know how long it will take until they break up or how successful you will be in making her forget him. It is best to focus on moving on rather than waiting for them to break up.
True. Also, why should I wait? She's worst woman in my life according to her actions
It is understandable why you would feel that way and it may be best to move on without waiting for them to break up.
So just forget the first woman I loved in a 10 years
It is best to focus on finding someone who truly cares about you instead of waiting for the other woman to change.

evidence: She felt something and likes me but loves other man.
It is clear that she was not being honest with you and was likely feeling guilty about it.
She lied about it for a month, treated me like junk,
I said that we can just talk and it will be ok.
She treated me with respect and love.
It is understandable why you would feel that way
She said that we should stop communicating because she is betraying another man
She lied about it for a month, treated me like junk,

evidence.quote: She felt something and likes me but loves other man.
It is clear that she was not being honest with you and was likely feeling guilty about it.
